ml_tags: Mary Patricia  Owen Francis  In Loving Memory Of Jonathan Jeremiah   Im gone home and its ok  “home with the lord which is far better;” LONEY Up with the Angels 8.5.1934 -7.12.2017 83yrs 8.5.1934 -7.12.2017 83yrs 8.5.1934 -7.12.2017 83yrs for the righteous Pray for us until we join you Your Loving Family & Friend's Mum - God's greatest gift May the strength of God instruct us, may the wisdom of God pilot us, may the hand of God direct us. may the word of God protect us, Be always ours this day and for evermore. - St. Patrick Welle always love you Strong and constant is my love! When you know sorrow I will come, I will embrace your heart! Through your pain you will discover me! XOX My Heart is torn between staying or going to be with the Lord It is in dying that we are born to eternal life. – St Francis of Assisi welcome you home with a A thousand million welcomes Relax & enjoy what God has prepared I am torn between the two: I desire to depart and be with Christ, which is better by far; within your life, Cead Mile Failte Thank You for everything May the Lord & his angels We miss  your strong & constant love Your kind, courageous & passionate heart You always went the extra mile for everyone gave yout heart & soul freely You are an inspiration especially  those in need , your friends & family
